 Job Responsibilities 

 
1. Responsible for BMS services, including installation & testing commissioning (Lead sub-
contractor: Johnson control) 
 
2. Responsible for BMS interface with electrical, mechanical & fire system interface. 
 
 
3. Review the shop drawing and make sure it is matching with the site situation, and follow the needed 
adjustment if required. 
 
4. Prepare working schedule and look ahead schedules. 
 
5. Taking of the material Quantities which is to complete the work. 
 
 
 
6. Follow up inspection request and dealing with QA/QC Team. 
 
7. Prepare daily report, reflecting site progress. 
 
8. Coordinate with electrical Sub-contractor and check their needs to complete the work. 
 
9. Coordination with other trades to complete full integration & interface. 
 
10. Installation supervision of the project BMS work for Electro-mechanical of equipment for the all raceway, 
EMT, RSC Conduit & Cable Trucking for areas all project. 
 
11. Installation supervision for AHUs & FCUs BMS controller & Pump control through BMS. 
 
12. Co-ordination with technical section, Johnson control & consultant for all BMS related work. 
 
13. Ensuring the site safety standards are maintained regularly.
